basic_info.description: I'm Kavya — a Senior Full‑Stack Java Developer with 8+ years building cloud‑native, secure, and scalable systems across banking, retail, rewards, and order management. I specialize in Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, REST APIs, Angular, and AWS. I deliver performant APIs, event‑driven architectures with Kafka, and automated CI/CD.

experience.title: Sr. Full‑Stack Developer
details: Designed microservices for rewards redemption using AWS services and REST APIs.
Integrated third‑party travel providers; enabled async flows with Kafka.
Built responsive Angular front‑end and CI/CD with Jenkins; zero‑downtime deployments.
Implemented security & compliance (PCI DSS, GDPR) and proactive monitoring.

experience.title: Full‑Stack Java Developer
details: Built backend services and REST APIs for Online State Apportionment (tax).
Implemented state‑specific rules and rollups; optimized complex SQL for scale.
Automated report generation and integrated with ERP/compliance platforms.
Deployed to AWS; added monitoring/logging for proactive alerting.

experience.title: Java Developer
details: Developed secure REST APIs and modular service layers for enterprise modules.
Optimized SQL and ensured transactional integrity; delivered dashboards.
Set up CI/CD pipelines and cloud deployments; maintained 99.9% uptime.

experience.title: Junior Java Developer
details: Integrated marketplace orders into OMS; added payment workflows and refunds.
Built APIs for order validation and reconciliation; improved performance with caching.
Automated EOD reconciliation; strengthened logging and retry mechanisms.
